description: Max no. cells
Max interaction distance betwen two cells
Size of grid in which neighbours are searched-default 50
Size of each grid cell-default 0.1 mm
Magnitude of noise
Simulation duration
Time step for Euler integration
No. frames of simulation output to vtk

condition for initialisation of cells: 0-random disk, 1-regular rectangle, 2-regular rectangle with spot, 3-fin mesh (need 10000 init cells minimum), 4-fin mesh with spot at left, 5-fin mesh with spot at top
mean distance between cells when initialised
distance between parent and child cells
Initial number of cells (n.b. depending on the initial condition, this number may need to be a specific multiple)
% type 1 cells in initial population
scale factor for init tissue
activate force walls
scale factor for wall offsets (fit with tis_s)
different advection strength in slow region
x width of the slow region (as a fraction of total tissue height)
distance between cell layers along z axis (mm) see Hirata et al. (2003)
fin growth switch
fin growth rate mm/day along proximal ap axis
cell movement switch
differential adhesion and repulsion switch
I-I repulsion inflection point (mm)
I-I max repulsion strength (mm/day)
Default repulsion inflection point (mm)
Default max repulsion strength (mm/day)
I-X repulsion inflection point (mm)
I-X max repulsion strength (mm/day)
advection switch
advection angle below y=0
default advection strength
advection strength in inter-rays
advection function: 0-constant, 1-linear(starting at left)
advection waiting time multiplier - max wait time is this * cont_time
proliferation switch
proliferation rules: 0-no child type switching, 1-B->A switching depending on r_A_birth, 2-A->B switching depending on r_A_birth and if u < uthresh for parent
division rate for T1/A cells
division rate for T2/B cells
chance of type 2 cells producing type 1 cells
max mech_str under which cells can divide
no. new cells added to staging area for each time step
min no. i in local nbhd of i for division
max no. x in annulus nbhd of i for division
min no. i in local nbhd of x for division
max no. x in annulus nbhd of x for division
switch cell types based on chemical amounts
allow cells to die when conditions met
probability of cell death if all other conditions are met
min no. x in annulus nbhd of i for death
min no. i in annulus nbhd of x for death
